random_offset_distance_range.description: Random offset which is added to the entity when spawned, min and max range. Minimum can be used to ensure it never spawns on a player

scale_rate_on_objective_completion.description: If set the spawn rate will be scaled based on how many primary objectives are completed

spawn_on_origin.description: [bool]If true then spawn always at the center of the map

spawn_on_navmesh.description: [bool]If true, will find the closest navmesh point. Agent_type will be recover from NavigationComponent if the instance have it, if not it will use the default one

paused_while_spawned.description: [bool]If true then spawn timer is paused while a previously spawned entity is alive

start_active.description: [bool]If true then this spawning is active as soon as this entity exists

avoid_objective_location_distance.description: How far we have to be from a location for the the spawn to trigger
